subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer finally cracked under the serve of John Isner, losing, 7-6 (3), 3-6, 7-6 (5), in the third round of the Paris Masters.
snippet: Roger Federer finally cracked under the serve of John Isner, losing, 7-6 (3), 3-6, 7-6 (5), in the third round of the Paris Masters.
